job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-27T05:38:00.000Z", "description": "Job Summary

Responsible for supporting the VMware initiatives, automation, operational support of infrastructure components and supporting technologies.

Reviews market trends and collaborate with vendors and other technology teams to develop infrastructure solutions.

Provide VMware infrastructure design and support, with a specific focus on VMware Infrastructure as a Service.

Position provides high level competency in the form of standards, design and solution architecture for VMware\u2010based services.

Qualifications

5+ years relevant experience providing infrastructure solutions and support, with a focus on VMware based cloud technologies such as VMware ESXi, VMware Site Recovery Manager, vRealize Automation, VMware NSX, vSphere vCenter and vROPs.

Experience with adjacent technologies such as virtualization, networking, automation.

Experience with major enterprise hardware platforms, i.e. Nutanix

Experience With AWS Or Other Cloud Technology a Plus

Comfortable adapting to dynamic, rapid and shifting environments

Experience creating innovative and unique solutions for automation using scripting languages and simplifying administration for others

Demonstrated ability to teach new skills and concepts to junior members of the team

Strong communication skills and self\u2010starter attitude with a strong ability to exercise independent judgment and critical thinking with minimal supervision

Strong understanding of Enterprise Best Practices

Analytical and research skills and problem solving

Education

Bachelor\u2019s degree preferred

If interested please forward your resume to kevin@libertyjobs.com

#associate

#mid

#vmware
